duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop technical solutions to business problems by defining and documenting requirements.
Write user stories and ensure integrity of stories across projects.
Write and validate acceptance criteria within area of expertise.
Facilitate requirements gathering sessions to aid partners in exposing and explaining their needs.
Conduct industry and internal research and apply best practices to Grainger.

Ensure decision-making by retrieving and aggregating data from multiple sources and compiling it into a clear and applicable format; Have an opinion as to what a correct decision is and influence the engineering team.
Create artifacts and provide data-driven recommendations that are clear to your business and technology partners.
Develop scaled, automated, user-friendly systems, reports and dashboards to support our needs.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in Business, Computer Science, Finance or related field (Master's preferred)
